text: The 2015–16 season was the 70th season in HNK Rijeka’s history. It was their 25th successive season in the Prva HNL, and 42nd successive top tier season. ==Competitions== ===Overall=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"| Competition !rowspan="2"| First match !rowspan="2"| Last match !rowspan="2"| Starting round !rowspan="2"| Final position !colspan="8"|Record |- !G !W !D !L !GF !GA !GD !Win % |- | align=left| MAXtv Prva Liga | align=left| 10 Jul 2015 | align=left| 14 May 2016 | align=left| Matchday 1 | align=left bgcolor=Silver| Runners-up |- | align=left| Croatian Cup | align=left| 23 Sep 2015 | align=left| 5 Apr 2016 | align=left| First round | align=left| Semi-final |- | align=left| UEFA Europa League | align=left| 16 Jul 2015 | align=left| 23 Jul 2015 | align=left| QR2 | align=left| QR2 |- !
